name: tm76
effect: Teaches Stealth Rock to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Struggle Bug to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Stealth Rock)

flavor_text.black_white: Resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets’ Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets’ Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
